meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of glia.
meanings.sent1: The glial cells provide support to neurons in the brain.
meanings.sent2: The glial tissue helps protect and nourish the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The glial support team in the brain always has each other's backs.
meanings.sent4: The glial network acts like a guardian shield around the neurons.
meanings.sent5: The glial structures resemble tiny protective shields around the neurons.

meanings.sent1: The glial functions are crucial for the health of the nervous system.
meanings.sent2: The glial cells play a vital role in maintaining brain function.
meanings.sent3: The glial party in the brain never stops, always supporting the neurons.
meanings.sent4: The glial connections are like invisible threads weaving through the brain.
meanings.sent5: The glial interactions are like a symphony of support for the neurons.

meanings.sent1: A glial helps in insulating and protecting nerve fibers.
meanings.sent2: The glial assists in maintaining the structure of the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The glial cell is like a tiny superhero protecting the neurons.
meanings.sent4: The glial acts as a loyal guardian for the neurons in the brain.
meanings.sent5: The glial cell is the unsung hero of the nervous system.
